author: cardanochina
title: China Info Hub Continued- Dumpling
description: The Cardano Chinese-speaking community has been forming nicely since F4. Continue the work to keep educating the Chinese-speakers globally

f6_assessments.q0: This project aims to provide educational information to the Chinese speaking community by using social networks & videos. It updates the information of the Cardano ecosystem to the community, and create healthy environments for Chinese-speaking people who love Cardano. The proposed amount is less than 3% of the total value of the Challenge budget, this project is expected to bring great efficiency compared to costs. The solution to reach a large audience using social media is completely reasonable. It is an economical solution, not limited in distance and time, very suitable for a large community spread around the world. However, this approach is often difficult to make a profound impact because most of the information only goes one way. That’s why it gets 4-stars for the Impact/Alignment rating.
f6_assessments.q1: It is quite impressive that the whole project will be done by only one girl with the nickname Bullish Dumpling. Her skills and experience can ensure the implementation of this idea as it has always been for the past 1 year. The information about her amazing works are very clear and easy for voters to check. The detailed plan and the timeline is not clear enough. Goals should be further broken down and have clear and reasonable deadlines. The requested fund for this proposal is only about 3% of the total budget for this Challenge. Expenses have been listed in 6 categories. It is relatively detailed and logical. It would be very risky for the project if Ms. Bullish Dumpling has health or contribution time issues. Therefore, it is advisable to consider recruiting more companions to develop a stronger project in the future and also reduce risks. Based on the provided information and the assessment as above, the proposal seems to be implemented successfully.
f6_assessments.q2: The key metrics to measure the development of this proposal are quantified in numbers. The proposer also explains the reason why she set the KPIs in a realistic way. They are all countable and transparent, making it easy for the community to check and monitor the project. The KPIs all aim to grow in numbers, about 25% within 3 months. It is also a good way to evaluate the success of the project. However this type metric alone could not be enough. Proposer should add a few metrics to measure the quality of the content, such as the number of positive reactions or the positive reaction ratios on social media platforms.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal fully adheres to the challenge given it is trying to expand the knowledge about Cardano and grow the Community of chinese speaking individuals globally specifically given the proposer speaks the language natively and therefore can add value through youtube videos and other sources of information to help people that maybe struggle with speaking other languages and would otherwise have no way of expanding their knowledge about the Cardano Ecosystem.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposer has been developing this project since Fund4 which demonstrates the commitment put into this project and is a clear indication that it is feasible and doable. The proposer is also a valued member of the Cardano community internationally which gives teh project even more credibility. 
The proposal goes into much detail which is also a plus and regarding timeline and budget it is broken down thoroughly given a very good indication the amount of work that will be required to continue making this project a reality. Overall very complete proposal which convinces the audience that it continues to be set for success.
f6_assessments.q2: KPIs and Metrics are set clearly in this proposal and there is an expectation for the proposer to grow its audience 20-25% whcih seems like an achievable number given the explanations in the proposal. All the detail in the proposal makes it easy to audit on the Catalyst side regarding progress and budget, which is a plus.

f6_assessments.q0: Bullish Dumpling has been effectively addressing this challenge for a while now.  This proposal specifically continues to do so. The plan is reasonable, and the pace of content creation is not overly optimistic. The proposal describes work that the proposer is already doing, and I see no reason for that to stop now. Translating Cardano content for a Chinese-speaking audience is insanely valuable work.
f6_assessments.q1: Bullish Dumpling has been a valuable  contributing member of the Cardano community for months. The content presented is well produced, and the proposer's access to notable figures from within Cardano to interview is a huge value add.  One cannot simply just do that - Bullish Dumpling can.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal is written clearly. The body of work gives confidence that the work will continue. The budget is reasonable, broken down to the hourly rate. A great proposal with valuable output.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal is a continuation of a previously funded project. Bullish dumpling is now a figure that most of the cardano community are familiar with. She runs a youtube channel which focuses on cardano educational content - with more than 4000 subscribers. She also animates twitter spaces that I follow from time to time. That said, I think that this proposal will continue to have a great impact and at the same time contribute to the value in the cardano  ecosystem.
f6_assessments.q1: I have high confidence in the feasibility of this proposal. The proposer has already built a youtube channel with lots of videos and subscribers. This proposal is about continuing the work and adding more content in the channel. Altogether, I think that bullish dumpling is a great asset for the cardano community and I support her work.
f6_assessments.q2: Since there is already a youtube channel, I think that the progress of this proposal can be easily tracked. The proposal has laid a detailed plan and a roadmap for the implementation. I think that people should follow bullish Dumpling twitter spaces and youtube channels.

f6_assessments.q0:
The proposal is about to continue the education about Cardano in Chinese language and maintain the Chinese-speaking Cardano community which was successfully built since Fund4 with link included
https://cardano.ideascale.com/c/idea/341094
The proposal definitely fits into the challenge as well as adds value to Cardano ecosystem, because the education would allow Mandarin speakers who want to join the Cardano community have a place to learn about Cardano, and allow existing members to keep learning deeper about Cardano, as well as the maintaining Chinese-speaking Cardano community allow people to connect, share and support each other without language barrier. If it is successful, the proposal will help to increase number of new members onboarding, number of active members, number of quality proposals from Chinese-speaking community and so much more, in other words, the proposal keeps encouraging the local Community Hubs to drive adoption and awareness of Cardano.
f6_assessments.q1: The author provides a detailed plan in a timeline 3 months with detailed budget breakdown and information of the proposer for us to assess the feasibility of the project: Regarding to the plan, we can see what needs to be done in each of months in a period 3 months. The financial amount is broken down in details and explained very reasonable, which allows us to understand what needs to be spend money on, and how much it costs, besides it also aligns the condition “does not exceed 5% of the total Challenge budget” because the asking fund $13550 is 2.71% of total Challenge budget. About the team who will conduct the project, due to the information which is provided fulfilling with skills and experience related to the executing the project, I believe she will execute the project successfully. The Hub she built successfully and the work she has made during the last 12 months is the strongest evidence for that. We can check on it with the links included.  In addition, regarding to the author’s statement that she will keep conducting the project even though this proposal would get funded or not, that shows the enthusiasm and commitment of the proposer towards Cardano community. Because of all those things above, I strong agree the proposal is feasible.
f6_assessments.q2:
The authors provide enough materials to audit the proposal, consist of detailed plan, roadmap with miliestones and KPIs, that allows us be able to track the project. It is clear that we have 2 parts to be tracked in this proposal: the education and the maintaining/expanding the community. About the education, the auditing is based on the roadmap and milestone, we can see videos (6-8 videos each month) in the Youtube Channel (for international viewers) or the domestic website. About measuring the number of subscribers and the groups members, we can do quite easy based on the KPIs through the links which are provided for each group.
I would recommend the author should give the number of subscribers and the number of two groups members in current. That’s just bonus, I still strong agree the proposal is fully auditable.

solution:
-Continue the education in the way of video content and text posts

-Maintain the community by building a strong Discord/Telegram presence
experience:
Single-handedly created a Chinese-speaking community from scratch (1200+members on Telegram)

Successfully expanded the reach of Cardano by making high-quality educational videos

Hosts Twitter Spaces, connecting the Chinese community with the international Cardano communities
